summary: The document is an FBI identification form dated 04/24/98, related to the JFK assassination system. It details a communication from the SAC, Los Angeles to the Director, FBI and SAC, Las Vegas, concerning John Roselli, also known as AR. The communication discusses Roselli's financial transactions, including a deposit at Fidelity Bank, Beverly Hills, and checks issued to Diplomat Apartments, Las Vegas, suggesting a possible change in his living arrangements. Efforts to resolve discrepancies in the notation of enterprises on checks are mentioned, with Emanuel Rothman identified as Roselli's auditor.
key_findings: The document is part of the FBI's records related to the JFK assassination system.
It details financial transactions and living arrangements of John Roselli, suggesting surveillance or investigation into his activities.
Discrepancies in the notation of enterprises on checks are noted, with efforts mentioned to resolve them.
Emanuel Rothman is identified as Roselli's auditor.
